#summary Querystring parameters for OpenHandle service

== Service ==

The project test service is sited at

  * [http://nascent.nature.com/openhandle/handle? http://nascent.nature.com/openhandle/handle?]

== Parameters ==

Recognized parameters are:

  * `id` = handle
  * `index` = handle value index
  * `type` = handle value type
  * `mimetype` = mime type for overriding default mime type
  * `format` = `rdf` | `n3` | `json`
  * `include` = `datatypes` (*not implemented yet*)

== Examples ==

  * [http://nascent.nature.com/openhandle/handle?id=10.1000/1 ?id=10.1000/1]

Returns default format (RDF/XML) for handle `10.1000/1` with mime type `application/rdf+xml` 

 * [http://nascent.nature.com/openhandle/handle?id=10.1000/1&format=n3 ?id=10.1000/1&format=n3]

Returns specified format (RDF/N3) for handle `10.1000/1` with mime type `application/rdf+n3` 

 * [http://nascent.nature.com/openhandle/handle?id=10.1000/1&format=rdf&mimetype=application/xml ?id=10.1000/1&format=rdf&mimetype=application/xml]

Returns specified format (RDF/XML) for handle `10.1000/1` with mime type `application/xml` 

 * [http://nascent.nature.com/openhandle/handle?id=10.1000/1&format=n3&mimetype=text/plain ?id=10.1000/1&format=n3&mimetype=text/plain]

Returns specified format (RDF/N3) for handle `10.1000/1` with mime type `text/plain` 

  * [http://nascent.nature.com/openhandle/handle?id=10.1000/1&index=1 ?id=10.1000/1&index=1]

Returns default format (RDF/XML) for handle `10.1000/1` and value for `index=1` with mime type `application/rdf+xml` 

  * [http://nascent.nature.com/openhandle/handle?id=10.1000/1&type=URL ?id=10.1000/1&type=URL]

Returns default format (RDF/XML) for handle `10.1000/1` and value for `type=URL` with mime type `application/rdf+xml`
